mapper.select: SELECT oc.ddate, COUNT(ou.rdate) userno FROM one_chart oc left outer join (SELECT TO_CHAR(regdate,'mm') as rdate FROM one_user WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE)=TO_CHAR(regdate,'yyyy') AND grade='ROLE_USER') ou ON oc.ddate=ou.rdate GROUP BY oc.ddate ORDER BY oc.ddate

SELECT oc.ddate, COUNT(ou.rdate) memberno FROM one_chart oc left outer join (SELECT TO_CHAR(regdate,'mm') as rdate FROM one_user WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE)=TO_CHAR(regdate,'yyyy') AND grade='ROLE_MEMBER') ou ON oc.ddate=ou.rdate GROUP BY oc.ddate ORDER BY oc.ddate

SELECT oc.ddate, COUNT(ou.rdate) preno FROM one_chart oc left outer join (SELECT TO_CHAR(regdate,'mm') as rdate FROM one_premium WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE)=TO_CHAR(regdate,'yyyy') AND pcheck=1) ou ON oc.ddate=ou.rdate GROUP BY oc.ddate ORDER BY oc.ddate
